# Dwarf Race Traits
## Overview
**Dwarf Race Traits**

Only dwarves can select these traits.


| **Trait** | **Source** |
|---|---|
| [[Brewmaster (Trait)\|Brewmaster]] | Ultimate Campaign 61 |
| [[Goldsniffer (Trait)\|Goldsniffer]] | Ultimate Campaign 61 |
| [[Tunnel Fighter (Trait)\|Tunnel Fighter]] | Ultimate Campaign 62 |

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 61
